descriptions.abbreviation: An official or commonly-used abbreviation for the resource.
descriptions.countries: The country or countries in which the resource was developed and/or is currently maintained.
descriptions.deprecation_reason: An explanation as to why this resource is no longer considered suitable for use.
descriptions.description: Free text summary of the resource and its purpose.
descriptions.domains: The domains for this record; domains tend to be more fine-grained terms relating to the scope of the resource.
descriptions.fairsharing_registry: The name of the registry to which this record belongs; one of Standards, Policies, or Databases.
descriptions.graph_button: Relation graphs are available for all records unless there are no relations or the graph has not yet been generated.
descriptions.homepage: The homepage of the resource. If there is no official homepage, a related URL may be used. For policies, the resource homepage must be the policy document itself.
descriptions.how_to_cite: How to cite this FAIRsharing record.
descriptions.maintainers: A list of developers of this resource who have claimed ownership of the record both for attribution and to perform updates to the record.
descriptions.name: The full name of this resource.
descriptions.organisations: Any organisations related to this resource, e.g. funders or maintainers.
descriptions.publication_for_citation: How to cite the resource described by this record.
descriptions.record_type: The type of resource this record describes; each FAIRsharing registry is composed of several types.
descriptions.reference_url: A direct link to the standards, policies or databases on the homepage of the organisation or group with which the collection is associated.
descriptions.taxonomies: The organismal taxonomies covered by this resource. This is only applicable to life sciences records.
descriptions.subjects: The broad subject area / academic disciplines for this record.
descriptions.tools: The tools associated with or maintained by this resource.
descriptions.user_defined_tags: The user-defined tags relevant to this resource; such tags are created by our users but are not yet incorporated into the FAIRsharing vocabularies.
descriptions.object_types: Object types define the type of digital research object that is in scope for the resource.
descriptions.year: The year in which the resource was created.
